titleStmt.title: A most worthy and famous vvorke, bothe pleasant and profitable, conteyning the longe and cruell warres between the Gothes and the valyant Romayne emperours, for the possession of Italy. VVith the vvounderful chances that hapned to both nations: / written in the Italian tongue, and nevvly translated into English by A.G.
De bello Italico adversus Gothos gesto. English
titleStmt.author: Bruni, Leonardo, 1369-1444.
Procopius.

publicationStmt.publisher: by VVyllyam Hovv, for George Bucke.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
